extendedInfo.description: With over 200 meteorologists and our ultra-local TruPoint(sm) forecasting technology, you can trust The Weather Channel to help you plan the best day possible, with the most accurate weather forecast available.Our favorite features include:- âExpect rain to start at 3:15pââNo more guessing! If your weather conditions (snow or rain) are changing within 6 hours, we let you know not only the chance of precipitation, but also the exact time it will happen.- Detailed weather forecasts (hourly forecasts, 36 hour forecasts, and 10 day forecasts)- Fast, accurate, and localized maps provide you with features like past radar and future radar, severe weather bulletins for storms, and tropical cyclone tracking (this includes hurricanes). - Easy location management, so you can edit and save your favorite places. Set up your favorites to take full advantage of our weather widgets and notifications. - Local forecast and popular videos- Beautiful and easy-to-use interfaceBut donât just listen to us! Hereâs what the experts are saying:âWe love [The Weather Channel app on Android] because we can hit all the important features, like âWhat It Feels Likeâ temperature, the 10-day forecast and hourly temperature, faster than any other app. If you need the âexpertiseâ of a meteorologist, the short and sweet video forecasts will get you up to speed in no time.â ~Gizmodoâs The Best Android Apps"Basically, forget everything you knew about The Weather Channel's app, because for all intents and purposes, this is an entirely new thing. And it's fantastic." - Android Police"One of the other new changes aside from an awesome new user interface is the way the app will alert you of rain. Before it had a general idea, but the official Weather Channel app will now tell you the exact time it will start raining in your location. Thatâs neat." - Android Community"My personal favorite is the new and improved narrative of climate descriptions. For example, the app now gives a more precise idea of what to expect from the weather in your area. Things like âdry conditions will continue,â and âexpect rain until 4 pm,â show up to clue you in about local weather. You could say, it pretty much takes the guesswork out of reading weather forecasts." - Android HeadlinesâGreat, up to the minute weather updates right to your phoneâ¦ Terrific, basic weather app backed by experts.â~Appolicious âYou can count on the fact that the data is vetted by a large team of on-staff weather professionals.â~ZeroPaidâThe Weather Channel app is necessary... With voice search, hourly forecasts, one-click access and local video highlights, this free Android app is essentialâ¦â ~Appolicious âMore intuitive, good-looking, and user friendlyâ¦ Thanks to The Weather Channel, you will have  comprehensive knowledge about predictions from wherever in the World.â ~AndroidZoomAmong the âFavorite Android Widgetsâ from Business Insider!Gold Medal winner from Gizmodoâs best weather apps!âThe Weather Channel App for Android has been ranked as the number 1 most downloaded weather app and one of the most used apps available on the Android Marketâ¦ so if youâre looking for a fully-featured weather app that delivers goodness all the time, go ahead and check it out.â ~IntoMobileThe Weather Channel greatly appreciates our customers' feedback and patience as we work on our next build. Please see our customer service page to provide feedback and for our FAQs: http://feedback.weather.com/Check us out at weather.com and follow us on Twitter @weatherchannel for the latest breaking news.

reviews.title: Upgrade not processing properly
reviews.comment: Almost a week ago, I sent your support team an email about this problem.  But so far, I haven\'t received any response or resolution from you concerning this problem.  My Android 2.2 phone is unable to process your latest upgrade.  Similar to another reviewer, I keep getting error messages indicating that the upgrade package file is not signed correctly.  I\'m able to download the upgrade just fine; I just can\'t process the upgrade because of the error message.  Previous upgrades for your app: no problem! _
reviews.author: OSBOYNES

reviews.title: Well that was a fail
reviews.comment: Only downloaded this because the weather channel screwed up their layout. Now uninstalling this too since they basically copied the same thing. How annoying.
reviews.author: Faith Huffman

reviews.title: Ditto
reviews.comment: Just like the regular weather channel, \"package file not properly signed\". Very disappointed in the support /system programmers. Definitely NOT your best work. Please correct asap!
reviews.author: Jackson Norton

reviews.title: Liked the old format better
reviews.comment: There was a reason I didn\'t down load the weather channel app. , becouse I don\'t like it now I am forced into it they should have left it alone so we had a choice.
reviews.author: Patrick Beach

reviews.title: What happened?
reviews.comment: I was updating the weather channel app which I have always used this app, now I get a message says package was signed correctly? FIX THIS PLEASE??

reviews.comment: Good weather app

reviews.comment: Good

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Goods

reviews.comment: Now filled with adware and popups. Uninstalled.

reviews.comment: Yo

reviews.title: Way Better Than TWC App
reviews.comment: This app is quickly going downhill
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The best ap available on HTC sensation 4g. Very informative. (Currently tracking TS Andrea)
reviews.author: Joe Jac

reviews.title: Great App
reviews.comment: This new 3.0 update is terrible.  Too many distracting images and colors.  Cartoonish in appearance, great for little kids and teenagers.  Frankly, this is the worst weather app out there.  Recommend NOAA Weather Service Apps.
reviews.author: Mark Stevens

reviews.title: Thanks for nothing....
reviews.comment: New update makes it suck as much as Weather Channel App. Good Bye, I am uninstalling.
reviews.author: Jim strope

reviews.title: NO
reviews.comment: F U and ur update. uninstall now. This is a bs app
reviews.author: Tiana Jagers

reviews.title: Crappy update
reviews.comment: I switched from weather channel to dish to get away from their horrible interface. THEN you went and copied it. Off to find another app now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to be a Great app
reviews.comment: I had to find a new app after The Weather Channel updated theirs. Your app is what I wanted and was glad to find. I disabled the automatic update to keep it the way it is.   UPDATE: Even though I disabled the automatic update, you found a way to update my app anyway. I now have the same piece of crap TWC gave me...and I hate. If I could give you a zero rating, I would. I am uninstalling the dish version. I guess I will check out accu weather.
reviews.author: M Phil

reviews.title: Update ruined this APP...
reviews.comment: Like many others on here I say why did you have to ruin a good thing? The old version was clean, simple, & it worked. Now if I go to hourly forecast I have to wait 30 seconds at least to scroll through the times...& then wait more. I used to give this 5 stars without batting an eye, but now I would give 0 if available. I\'ll give it a couple weeks, & if a version closer to the old one or at least more efficient doesn\'t come across form you guys, I\'m uninstalling looking elsewhere... Old 5 star. New 0 star.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Idiots
reviews.comment: Everything was perfect except that there are no widgets.  Idiots updated it to the new weather channel layout. Horrible.
reviews.author: Tom Varanese

reviews.title: Good app gone bad
reviews.comment: The new update to clone the Weather Channel app destroyed a good simple app.  Too much clutter and baggage now. App was using over 25 meg and  only ran it for 5 minutes at one location.  Time to uninstall.
reviews.author: David Collins
